name: Dune Desert Adventure
description: Experience the majestic red dunes of Sossusvlei with expert guides and luxury camping.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Scenic Drive
itinerary.description: Arrive in Windhoek and drive to the Namib Desert. Settle into your luxury camp and enjoy dinner under the stars.

itinerary.title: Dune Exploration
itinerary.description: Wake up early for sunrise at Sossusvlei. Explore the iconic red dunes and visit Deadvlei.

itinerary.title: Desert Culture
itinerary.description: Visit San Bushmen community, learn about their traditions, and enjoy a traditional meal.

name: Etosha Wildlife Safari
description: Witness the incredible wildlife of Etosha with game drives and professional wildlife photographers.

itinerary.title: Park Entry & First Game Drive
itinerary.description: Enter Etosha and head to your safari lodge. Afternoon game drive to spot wildlife.

itinerary.title: Full Day Safari
itinerary.description: Morning and afternoon game drives. Watch elephants, lions, and zebras at the waterholes.

itinerary.title: Specialist Game Drive
itinerary.description: Join expert guides for advanced wildlife photography and rare animal spotting.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Morning game drive and return journey to Windhoek.

name: Skeleton Coast Expedition
description: Explore the wild and remote Skeleton Coast with dramatic landscapes and shipwrecks.

itinerary.title: Coastal Discovery
itinerary.description: Drive to the Skeleton Coast and explore the dramatic shoreline.

itinerary.title: Shipwreck Tours
itinerary.description: Visit historic shipwrecks and learn maritime history.

itinerary.title: Wildlife & Nature
itinerary.description: Spot desert elephants and other wildlife adapted to harsh conditions.

itinerary.title: Return Journey
itinerary.description: Scenic drive back with stops at key viewpoints.

name: Fish River Canyon Hiking
description: Hike through Africa's largest canyon with stunning vistas and geological formations.

itinerary.title: Canyon Exploration
itinerary.description: Guided hike through the Fish River Canyon with expert geological commentary.

itinerary.title: Scenic Trail
itinerary.description: Complete the canyon trail with opportunities for photography and wildlife spotting.

name: Damaraland Cultural Tour
description: Immerse yourself in Damara culture and visit Twyfelfontein ancient rock engravings.

itinerary.title: Cultural Meeting
itinerary.description: Meet with Damara communities and learn about their traditions and crafts.

itinerary.title: Twyfelfontein
itinerary.description: Visit UNESCO site with ancient rock engravings and learn about prehistoric art.

name: Swakopmund Adventure
description: Experience beach activities, desert adventures, and colonial charm in Swakopmund.

itinerary.title: Beach & Adventure
itinerary.description: Sandboarding, quad biking, and beach exploration.

itinerary.title: Colonial Town
itinerary.description: Explore colonial architecture, local markets, and seafood restaurants.

name: Windhoek City Experience
description: Accommodation: Avani Windhoek Hotel & Casino – Approx N$1,800 per night. Website: https://www.avanihotels.com/en/windhoek
highlights: Katutura Cultural Tour – N$500 pp. Oshili Namibia Travel. Tel: +264 81 209 4684

name: Joe’s Beerhouse Dinner. Website: https://www.joesbeerhouse.com
description: Transport: Hertz Car Rental Namibia – From N$850/day. Website: https://www.hertz.com.na

name: Sossusvlei Desert Adventure
description: Accommodation: Sossusvlei Lodge – Approx N$3,000 per night. Website: https://www.sossusvlei-lodge.com Transport: Bidvest Car Rental Namibia – From N$900/day. Website: https://www.bidvestrentacar.co.za
highlights: Park Entry – N$150 pp via NWR. Website: https://www.nwr.com.na
Dune 45 & Deadvlei Guided Tour – N$900 pp. Namibia Desert Tours. Tel: +264 81 600 1242

name: Swakopmund Coastal Escape
description: Accommodation: Strand Hotel Swakopmund – Approx N$2,500 per night. Website: https://www.strandhotel.com.na Transport: Europcar Namibia – From N$780/day. Website: https://www.europcar.com.na
highlights: Dolphin & Seal Cruise – N$800 pp. Mola Mola Safaris. Website: https://www.mola-mola.com
Living Desert Tour – N$950 pp. Tommy’s Desert Tours. Tel: +264 81 128 3050

name: Etosha Wildlife Safari
description: Accommodation: Okaukuejo Resort (NWR) – Approx N$1,400 per night. Website: https://www.nwr.com.na Transport: Avis Car Rental Namibia – From N$950/day. Website: https://www.avis.co.za

name: Damaraland Culture & Heritage
description: Accommodation: Twyfelfontein Adventure Camp – Approx N$1,900 per night. Website: https://www.twyfelfonteinadventurecamp.com Transport: Britz Namibia 4x4 Rentals – From N$1,200/day. Website: https://www.britz.co.za
highlights: Damara Living Museum – N$150 pp. Website: https://www.lcfn.info/damara
Desert Elephant Tracking – N$1,000 pp. Tel: +264 67 333 900

name: Kaokoland & Himba Cultural Journey
description: Accommodation: Opuwo Country Lodge – Approx N$1,700 per night. Website: https://www.opuwocountrylodge.com Transport: Caprivi Car Hire – From N$1,100/day. Website: https://www.caprivicarhire.com

name: Caprivi Wetlands & Wildlife
description: Accommodation: Zambezi Mubala Lodge – Approx N$2,000 per night. Website: https://www.gondwana-collection.com Transport: Savanna Car Hire – From N$950/day. Website: https://www.savannacarhire.com
highlights: Bwabwata National Park Safari – N$300 pp.

name: Romantic Couples Escape
description: Accommodation: GocheGanas Wellness Retreat – Approx N$3,200 per night. Website: https://www.gocheganas.com Transport: Transfers included.
highlights: Couples Spa Treatment – N$1,500 per couple.

name: Family Adventure Package (6 People)
description: Accommodation: Arebbusch Travel Lodge – Approx N$1,300 for family unit. Website: https://www.arebbusch.com Transport: Toyota Quantum rental – From N$1,600/day (Hertz Namibia).
highlights: Okapuka Safari Lodge Game Drive – N$450 pp. Website: https://www.okapuka-safari-lodge.com

name: Family Coastal Holiday (8 People)
description: Accommodation: Swakopmund Plaza Hotel – Approx N$2,000 per night. Website: https://www.swakopmundplazahotel.com Transport: VW Transporter – From N$2,000/day via Avis Namibia.
highlights: Sandboarding – N$600 pp. Alter Action. Website: https://www.sandboarding-namibia.com
Camel Riding – N$250 pp. Swakop Camel Farm.
